rule: The <strong> and <em> tags must be used to emphasize key words and phrases.
input: Education enlightens minds. Equality ensures equity. Justice upholds integrity.
validityText:
The input is a paragraph of text that consists of three separate sentences. Each sentence is clearly distinct as they are punctuated with periods. The input does not consist solely of whitespace characters as it contains alphanumeric characters and punctuation. This complies with the input specification which requires a paragraph with at least three separate sentences and not solely made up of whitespace.

OK
